author: Guyver1wales
body:
Fedora 30
[MIRROR] powershell-6.2.2-1.rhel.7.x86_64.rpm: Status code: 404 for https://packages.microsoft.com/rhel/7/prod/powershell-6.2.2-1.rhel.7.x86_64.rpm
[FAILED] powershell-6.2.2-1.rhel.7.x86_64.rpm: No more mirrors to try - All mirrors were already tried without success 

Error: Error downloading packages:
  Cannot download powershell-6.2.2-1.rhel.7.x86_64.rpm: All mirrors were tried

comments.author: Guyver1wales
comments.body:
thi appears to have now been fixed and I have installed the new update successfully.
This can be closed

title: RHEL Repo broken for new 6.2.2 release
